name: KILLING TIME (itch) (Kenomica Productions)
description:
SUMMARY

Created in seven days for the Epic Mega Jam

Killing Time is a playful, casual game where you control one half of a romantic couple, locked down alone in their home due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Pass the time with meaningless distractions, manage your work from home schedule, and restock your supplies. Survive the looming madness of lockdown life, find ways to cope while also keeping your job, and count down the days until lockdown is over and you can finally reunite with your other half. 

FEATURES
  • Survive a week in lockdown by participating in various activities
  • Frantically run around your apartment with hilarious physics
  • Watch time fly by or halt to a crawl based on your actions
  • Earn money to restock your supplies, while taking care not to burn out
